Title: Relates to allowing for students in postsecondary education experience or transition program to receive awards from the tuition assistance program
Summary: Relates to allowing for students in certain postsecondary education experience or transition programs to receive awards from the tuition assistance program.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to allowing for students in postsecondary education experience or transition program to receive awards from the tuition assistance program
